TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit GroupBoxRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用來呈現群組方塊控制項的方法 (不論有沒有視覺化樣式)。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a group box control with or without visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組`static`方法可以用來呈現群組方塊控制項。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a group box control. 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 若要繪製群組方塊中，使用其中一種方法。To draw a group box, use one of the methods. 這些方法會提供各種不同的文字的繪圖選項。These methods provide a variety of text drawing options. 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至目前的應用程式，時，會繪製目前的視覺化樣式的群組方塊。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, will draw the group box with the current visual style. 否則，時，會繪製群組方塊中，使用傳統的視窗樣式。Otherwise, will draw the group box with the classic Windows style. 這非常有用，如果要繪製的自訂控制項，應該會自動比對目前的作業系統的視覺化樣式設定。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should automatically match the current visual style setting of the operating system. 這個類別會包裝的功能設定為其中一個項目所公開類別。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用的自訂控制項方法，如果已啟用視覺化樣式繪製框線為雙線與群組方塊。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the method to draw a group box with a double border if visual styles are enabled. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

span.span: Draws a group box control.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DrawGroupBox (System.Drawing.Graphics g, System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GroupBoxState state);

.method public static hidebysig void DrawGroupBox(class System.Drawing.Graphics g, valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GroupBoxState state) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DrawGroupBox (g As Graphics, bounds As Rectangle, state As GroupBoxState)
public: static void DrawGroupBox(System::Drawing::Graphics ^ g, System::Drawing::Rectangle bounds, System::Windows::Forms::VisualStyles::GroupBoxState state);

span.span: The used to draw the group box.
The that specifies the bounds of the group box.

param.name: state
param.span: 的其中一個值，指定群組方塊的可見狀態。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the visual state of the group box.

summary.span: 在指定的狀態和範圍中繪製群組方塊控制項。

span.span: Draws a group box control in the specified state and bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至目前的應用程式，這個方法將會繪製目前的視覺化樣式的群組方塊。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the group box with the current visual style. 否則，這個方法時，會繪製群組方塊中，使用傳統的視窗樣式。Otherwise, this method will draw the group box with the classic Windows style. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用中自訂控制項的方法方法來繪製框線為雙線與群組方塊。The following code example uses the method in a custom control's method to draw a group box with a double border. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#2)]

.property bool RenderMatchingApplicationState
Public Shared Property RenderMatchingApplicationState As Boolean
public: static property bool RenderMatchingApplicationState { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出產生器是否會使用應用程式狀態來判斷呈現樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the renderer uses the application state to determine rendering style.

value.span: 如果會使用應用程式狀態來判斷呈現樣式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the application state is used to determine rendering style; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`、使用中的設定判斷轉譯樣式。If is `true`, the uses the setting from to determine the rendering style. 如果是`false`，轉譯器永遠會轉譯使用視覺化樣式。If is `false`, the renderer will always render using visual styles. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用来變更是否使用視覺化樣式呈現群組方塊屬性。The following code example uses the property to change whether a group box is rendered using visual styles. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
